invert.name: Invert Keybinding
invert.hint: Only enable the default context menu when the Control key is pressed

dmOnly.name: DM Only
dmOnly.hint: Only enable the default context menu for DMs

showStateIcon.name: Show State Icon
showStateIcon.hint: Show an icon indicating whether or not the Default Context Menu is paused.

timeoutDuration.name: Timeout Duration
timeoutDuration.hint: The number of seconds after which the Default Context Menu should timeout.

pauseContextMenu.name: Pause Context Menu
pauseContextMenu.hint: Pause showing the Default Context Menu
